content.description: crux is 1st couple moves.  Still working Beta after cleaning out the brush.
content.location: Start is with right hand crimp, left hand corner pinch, left heel hook.  1st moves are difficult

content.description:
youtube.com/watch?v=5WPO0Y5â€¦

  video around 2:00-3:30 shows line and beta.   

  Start for this version of the climb involves starting with right hand on high pinch and left hand on corner pinch, with feet on the rock separate from the main boulder.  The start in the video is NOT the V5 version. 

  The route is still a lot of fun for people who cannot get the start of the V5 version.
content.location: Directly line up left side of Harambe Boulder

content.description: Start matched on jug on left side of boulder.  Route traverses boulder to the right.  Very crimpy holds after starter jug.   Crux comes about middle of the route.   top out can be controlled with good heel hook
content.protection: 2 Pad's plus good spotter.  wouldn't do this one alone
content.location: Harambe Boulder, go down 1st set of stairs and veer to the left after leaving fire tower

content.description:
Even though our fearless leader Harambe is gone, his spirit lives on.   up the stairs from Latrine boulder, below fire tower.  Not a true path to the boulder but only around 20 ft from the stairs/path 

  Update 10-22-17.  All brush under the boulder had been cleared
